data.title: Visual Artists' News Sheet - 2017 July August
data.meta_description: Columns: Martin Waldmeier on who biennials are speaking to. Joanne Laws on Women Artists at Venice, Áine Phillips on playing hard to get and Conor ...
data.text: Columns: Martin Waldmeier on who biennials are speaking to. Joanne Laws on Women Artists at Venice, Áine Phillips on playing hard to get and Conor McGrady on how doing what we are told makes us free. Dún Laoghaire-Rathdown Regional Profile. Pádraic E. Moore interviews Vivienne Dick about her career and current exhibition with Nan Goldin at IMMA. Michelle Boyle reports from the Kochi-Muziris Biennale. Ruth le Gear talks about her project and publication ‘Water Remedies’. Anne Mullee reports on Irish representation at Venice. Austin Hearne describes the evolution of his practice. Barry Kehoe outlines IMMA’s special tours for people with dementia. Jonathan Carroll reports from Documenta and Skulptur Projekte Münster. Joanne Laws looks at issues facing studio providers across the country. In his column, Rob Hilken looks at issues facing studios across Northern Ireland. And much more...
